evidence_example.title: test3
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to create two TASKs with different priorities.
evidence_example.long_descr:
A minimal EE demo that demonstrates how to create two TASKs with different priorities. This demo can be used to test the preemption mechanism. In this case Task2 preempts Task1. The compilation uses the conf.oil file to create Debug folder. Debug folder contains:
  • the makefile;
  • the obj folder that contains the object files organized in a EE-like tree;
  • the executable file (.exe);
  • other files useful for debug;
